articles.title: Putin threatens to 'freeze' Europe with total energy cut-off - The Telegraph
articles.description: Russian leader vows to stop all supplies if Brussels goes ahead with price cap on his gas
articles.content:
Vladimir Putin has threatened to freeze Europe with a total shutdown of energy supplies if Brussels presses ahead with a price cap on Russian gas.
